mapper.sql: id, statistics_month, platform_id, platform_name, source_type, login_population, play_population, execute_time
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(login_population) AS loginPopulationSum, SUM(play_population) AS playPopulationSum FROM month_login_report WHERE statistics_month = #{month}
mapper.insert: insert into month_login_report (id, statistics_month, platform_id, platform_name, source_type, login_population, play_population, execute_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statisticsMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{loginPopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{playPopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

statistics_month = #{statisticsMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

source_type = #{sourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
login_population = #{loginPopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
